text: Noor-e-Zindagi () is a Pakistani drama serial that first aired on Geo Entertainment on 15 July 2016. It is produced by Abdullah Kadwani and Asad Qureshi. It on air every Friday at 8:00 P.M on Geo Entertainment. == Cast == *Ayesha Khan as Noor Jahan *Syed Jibran as Saleem *Shakeel as Noor's father *Noman Habib as Waseem (Saleem's younger brother) *Faria Sheikh as Zebo (Noor's younger sister) *Sajida Syed as Saleem and Waseem's mother *Esha Noor as Gulshan *Farah Nadir as Gulshan's mother *Anam Tanveer as Gulshan's elder sister *Humaira Bano as Noor's elder sister's (Mehrunissa) mother-in-law *Saleem Mairaj as Saleem's friend *Sumaiyya Bukhsh as Mano (Saleem's younger sister ) == Soundtrack == The original soundtrack of Noor-e-Zindagi is composed and sung by Shuja Haider and Rosemary. The song is available on Patari. == Awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ !Date of Ceremony !Award !Category !Recipient(s) and nominee(s) !Result !Ref. |- | rowspan="5" |17 September 2017 | rowspan="5" |IPPA Awards London 2017 |Best Television Director |Siraj-ul-Haque | | |- |Best Television Play |Noor-e- Zindagi | | rowspan="4" | |- |Best Television Actor |Syed Jibran | |- |Best Television Actress |Aisha Khan | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:A&B; Entertainment Category:7th Sky Entertainment Category:Pakistani drama television series Category:2016 Pakistani television series debuts Category:2017 Pakistani television series endings Category:Urdu-language television shows Category:Geo TV original programming
title: Noor-e-Zindagi
